name: Twitch.tv Crosshair Dot - treasury
description:
Check out the original style at userstyles.org
Puts a Crosshair Dot on the Twitch Stream, because it is usually not visible on the compressed video (For example on H1Z1 Streams).
obsoletion_message: It was written for an older version of the site.
